resources.string: Hold the phone to your ear…
App can\'t work without these permission, sorry…
Hold your phone to your ear to answer

You will hear 2 beeps when the app is ready to take the call. Then, simply hold the phone to your ear in an upright position to answer the call. The app will beep 3 more times to signify it detecting proximity to your ear.
Failed registering sensors, your device may lack a proximity sensor or accelerometer. Raise To Answer cannot continue.
Answer by holding your phone to your ear
Please select the features you want to enable
Decline by putting your phone down screen-first
